title: Which would be a better book to analyze for an essay, To Kill a Mockingbird or The Catcher in the Rye? - Quora
tags: The Catcher in the Rye (1951 book)
Literature of the United States of America

response.answer_text: I prefer To kill a mocking bird. There are so many facts that can be pointed out in ur essay like how a father should act ..about what a hero is and so on As for the Catcher in the rye ,u need to understand the book deeply ;the teenage boy’s emotion ,his personality and the environment he was brought up and so on (This is just personal preference )
